text: Sierra Heights is having a STEM night (6-7ish) this Thursday and wanted to know if we could help out.   Please let me know if this something we can support. If it is I will send further details when I recieve them.

text: Ok sweet. How do they want us to help?

elements.text: Ok sweet. How do they want us to help?

text:
We’ll be having a STEAM Family Night via Zoom this Thursday, 6/10/21 from 6-7:30 p.m. I will be with two other teachers in the “Engineering: Letter E” breakout room. The Robotics Team is welcome to join and teach a lesson to the students, both primary and intermediate! If they’d like, they can just join in and help facilitate groups of students building structures and/or teach a STEAM lesson. As I understand, there will be 2 different sessions for 20 minutes each. I will be teaming with intermediate teachers so that’s why our audience will be primary and intermediate. I would like your awesome students to get some credit for their hard work and effort working on the virtual STEAM club this year that never fully took off. However, I’m looking forward to using the curriculum created this year for next year’s STEAM Club at Sierra, with permission from Ms. Bohn of course.
 
*STEAM Family Night on Zoom* 
June 10th: 6-7:30 p.m.

If interested, I will send the Zoom link. Please let me know and no pressure! I just wanted the students to be a part of this opportunity to connect with SHE students during STEAM Family Night.

STEAM Family Night on Zoom
